title: Champion Capsule Bug
body:
Hi,

I literally just leveled up to 72 , and I received a Champion Capsule, but it is not in my Loot. Meaning, it showed the animation for receiving it, and then when I went to Loot section to receive it, It is not there.

Thanks,

M

replies.body:
Hey Hachikari,

It looks like you eventually received the capsule?  I see you opened one a few hours after being granted the level 72 reward.

{{champion:236}}  

Let me know. :)
